messages.title: LET'S GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: And get on with our priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose Labour's threat to Grammar Schools and all private education.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HS2 IS A BLIGHT ON BUCKS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Challenge the HS2 project and stand with campaigners who want it stopped.
Balance the need for homes with protecting the environment.
Deliver Brexit then focus on day to day issues such as investing in the NHS, policing, and education.

issues.brexitEurope: Deliver Brexit then focus on day to day issues.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.

housing.content: We need homes for our children and grandchildren but these must go hand in hand with infrastructure.

leaflet.personalStatement: A new local voice for Beaconsfield.

quotes.text: Deliver Brexit then focus on day to day issues.

images.caption: Time for a change in Beaconsfield.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Philip Dumville, on behalf of Joy Morrissey.
